States of Matter.question: Which one isn’t a property of gases?
Which one is a property of solids?
Which one isn't a common property of gases and liquids?
Which state of matter has a definite volume but an indefinite shape?

Pure Substances.question: Which of the following is true about pure substances?
options: They can be broken down into their particles by a physical change

Pure Substances.question: Which type of substance is a pure substance?
Which of the following isn't true about elements?
options: They can be broken down into smaller particles
They are composed of only one kind of atom
They are notated with a capital letter followed by up to two lowercase letters
They are listed in the periodic table

Pure Substances.question: Which type of substance has more than one type of atom in it?
Which of the following isn't true about compounds?
options: They can be broken down into smaller particles by a physical change
They are composed of two or more atoms of the same element
They must have at least two different elements

Pure Substances.question: Which of the following is the definition of the “Law of Constant Composition”?
options: The elemental composition of a compound is always the same
The elemental composition of a compound is never the same
The elemental composition of a compound depends on the temperature and pressure of the environment
The elemental composition of a compound depends only on the temperature of the environment

Classification of Matter.question: Which one isn’t a property of a matter?
options: It doesn’t have to have a definite mass
It doesn't have to have a definite volume

Classification of Matter.question: Which one is a substance that can not be broken down into smaller parts?
Which one is the smallest particle of a substance?
Which one is a chemical combination of two or more atoms?
What is the difference between an element and a molecule?
options: An element can not be broken down into smaller parts whereas a molecule can
A molecule can not be broken down into smaller parts whereas an element can
An element has a definite shape whereas a molecule doesn’t
